meanings.definition: The quality or state of being basic or fundamental.
meanings.sent1: The elementariness of the building blocks made it easy for the children to understand.
meanings.sent2: The elementariness of the recipe made it perfect for beginners.
meanings.sent3: The elementariness of the puzzle was so obvious that even a cat could solve it.
meanings.sent4: The elementariness of the melody resonated with everyone in the audience.
meanings.sent5: The elementariness of the concept was like a bright light in a dark room.

meanings.definition: The simplicity or straightforwardness of something.
meanings.sent1: She appreciated the elementariness of the instructions, as they were easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The elementariness of the design made it accessible to all users.
meanings.sent3: The elementariness of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The elementariness of her approach to problem-solving was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The elementariness of the solution was like finding a key to a locked door.
